name: Insania (itch)
description:
!HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED!

Story

You wake up and realize you've been thrown into a room with death himself.

Remembering your past only brings up more questions but death makes it clear; you are dead and you have to beat him by doing a trial of 3 games.

Win them all, you beat death and get a second chance at life.

When you lose...
